sentences.en: He attempted to rebut the assertions made by the prosecution witness.
sentences.cn: 他试图反驳控方证人所作的断言.

sentences.en: He attempts to rebut the assertion made by the prosecution witness.
sentences.cn: 他试图反驳原告方证人所作的断言.

sentences.en: He rebut the argument of the other team In a debate.
sentences.cn: 他反驳辩论会中对方的论证.

sentences.en: He spent most of his speech rebutting criticisms of his foreign policy.
sentences.cn: 他大部分的演讲都用来反驳他在外交政策上受到的各种批评。

sentences.en: In another category there are the unjustifiable ones , and these we must rebut.
sentences.cn: 一种是闹得不对的, 要驳回去.

sentences.en: The defendant may admit or rebut the claims and shall have the right to file counterclaims.
sentences.cn: 被告可以承认或者反驳诉讼请求,有权提起反诉.

sentences.en: Their impregnable arguments are hard to rebut.
sentences.cn: 他们牢不可破的论点很难被驳倒.

trans.tran_en: to prove that a statement or a charge made against you is false
